name: Depth Mirror
description:
You are a wizard who has come across some old ruins containing magical mirrors. It's said they can bring you to another dimension...

Switch between 2d platformer and 3d block pushing puzzler in this game built around the theme: Another Dimension!

Controls:

Platformer:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

3d mode:

WASD: Up, left, down, and right movement respectively

Press R to restart the level if you get softlocked

Credits:

Game by Roy

Sound Effects by Panda

Music by Jad
